actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require skilled nursing facilities under the Medicare program and the Medicaid program to provide medical social services.

summary.text: Requires skilled nursing facilities under the Medicare program and the Medicaid program of the Social Security Act to provide medical social services related to long-term care on a regular basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require skilled nursing facilities under the Medicare program and the Medicaid program to provide medical social services.
